text:
Hehe
That's quite sudden, isn't it?

No, it's not sudden. I always think about it.
──Oh, but saying it out loud might seem sudden.
I want to convey what I wish for Sakuya,
To enjoy being an idol while wearing that costume.

The job of being an idol── being part of our agency,
I hope you feel glad you chose it.

And I hope that positive feeling also reaches the fans,
That's what I'm hoping for!

...... It would have been good if you had pointed out
more of my shortcomings. You're really kind, aren't you──...
